title: My google pixel 5 is stuck on 5th October 2020 security update! I try to update but stuck again!!
content: I keep trying to update the phone either through security on the settings or through system settings and it says preparing update for ages and then checking update and then it just keeps saying either of them two things never updates it's stuck on 5th October 2020 security update and the date today is 10th Feb 2021 so how come it won't update to Feb 2021 security update????!!!!! PLEASE HELP, SO FRUSTRATING!!!! PLUS..... Brand new google pixel 5! THANK YOU!!!!! P.S tried factory reset still doesn't update, tried resetting phone to but same problem. Don't have a laptop or computer to update it that way either!!!!!! AARGHHHH!!!!! :)
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
